title: 2006 SolarTech Silent Messenger II
item_description:
2006 SolarTech Silent Messenger II

Trailer Details

  • Year: 2006
  • Make: SolarTech
  • Model: Silent Messenger II
  • VIN: 4GM1M091061452983 (no record on file with DMV)
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 1600Lb

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Number of Axles: 1
  • Number of Wheels: 2
  • Tire Size: 185/70R13
  • Electric Plug Type: 4-Way Flat
  • Hitch: 2" Ball

 

Note: Bill of Sale only. The VIN located on the frame was verified with CA DMV, no record on file. Therefore, the buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only, which will be mailed within 2 days after the removal ends. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, taxes, fees, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a title/license/registration.
